termsandconditions.title: Welcome to our matchmaking platform for online and physical training (the 'Platform'). The following terms and conditions (the 'Terms') govern your access  and use of our Platform, including any content and services offered on or through the Platform.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of the Terms
acceptance.subtopic1: By using the Platform, you accept and agree to be bound and abide by these Terms. If you do not agree to these Terms, you must not access or use the Platform.

changes.title: Changes to the Terms
changes.subtopic1: We may revise and update these Terms from time to time in our sole discretion. All changes are effective immediately when we post them and apply to all access to and use of the Platform there after.

accessing.title: Accessing the Platform
accessing.subtopic1: We reserve the right to withdraw or amend the Platform, and any service or material we provide on the Platform, in our sole discretion without notice.

contributions.title: User Contributions and Transactions
contributions.subtopic1: The Platform may contain user profiles, training course listings, course reviews, and other interactive features. These allow users to post, submit, publish, display or transmit content, and importantly, purchase training courses offered by trainers.
contributions.subtopic2: All user contributions, including purchases, must comply with our content and transaction standards. By making a purchase, you agree to abide by the terms, conditions, and payment obligations associated with that purchase.
contributions.subtopic3: Trainers offering courses on the Platform are responsible for complying with all applicable laws and regulations related to their course content and transactions. This includes but is not limited to ensuring the accuracy of course descriptions, appropriate handling of customer transactions, and providing reliable customer support related to their courses.

prohibited.title: Prohibited Uses
prohibited.subtopic1: You may not use the Platform for any purpose that is illegal or prohibited by these Terms. Prohibited uses include, but are not limited to, using the Platform in any way that violates any applicable local or international law or regulation.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer of Warranties
disclaimer.subtopic1: Your use of the Platform is at your own risk. The Platform is provided on an 'as is' and 'as available' basis, without any warranties of any kind, either express or implied.

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation.subtopic1: To the maximum extent permitted by law, in no event will we be liable for damages of any kind, under any legal theory, arising out of or in connection with your use, or inability to use, the Platform.

governing.title: Governing Law and Jurisdiction
governing.subtopic1: These Terms and any dispute or claim arising out of, or related to them, shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the internal laws of [Kingdom of Saudi Arabia].

contactus.title: Contact us
contactus.subtopic1: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or our privacy practices, please contact us at Email
contactus.weverecieved: We've received your message and will contact you soon

privacypolicy.title: Welcome to our matchmaking platform for online and physical training (the 'Platform'). We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy will inform you about how we handle your personal data, your privacy rights, and how the law protects you.

datacollect.title: Data We Collect
datacollect.topic: We may collect, use, store and transfer the following kinds of personal data about you:
datacollect.subtopic1: 1. Identity Data: Includes first name, last name, and gender.
datacollect.subtopic2: 2. Contact Data: Includes email address and telephone numbers.
datacollect.subtopic3: 3. Technical Data: Includes internet protocol (IP) address, your login data, browser type and version, and other technology on the devices you use to access the Platform.
datacollect.subtopic4: 4. Profile Data: Includes your interests, preferences, training data, feedback and survey responses.

datause.title: How We Use Your Data
datause.topic: We will only use your personal data when the law allows us to. Most commonly, we will use your personal data in the following circumstances:
datause.subtopic1: 1.  Register you as a new customer and manage your account.
datause.subtopic2: 2. To provide and improve our services.
datause.subtopic3: 3. To manage our relationship with you, including notifying you about changes to our terms or privacy policy.
datause.subtopic4: 4. To enable you to participate in a prize draw, competition or complete a survey.

disclosures.title: Disclosures of Your Personal Data
disclosures.subtopic1: We may share your personal data with external third parties only in the ways that are described in this privacy policy. We do not sell your personal data to third parties.

security.title: Data Security
security.subtopic1: We have implemented appropriate security measures to prevent your personal data from being accidentally lost, used or accessed in an unauthorized way, altered or disclosed.

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.subtopic1: We will only retain your personal data for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes we collected it for, including for the purposes of satisfying any legal, accounting, or reporting requirements.

rights.title: Your Legal Rights
rights.subtopic1: Under certain circumstances, you have rights under data protection laws in relation to your personal data, including the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data.

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation.subtopic1: To the maximum extent permitted by law, in no event will we be liable for damages of any kind, under any legal theory, arising out of or in connection with your use, or inability to use, the Platform.

governing.title: Governing Law and Jurisdiction
governing.subtopic1: These Terms and any dispute or claim arising out of, or related to them, shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the internal laws of [Kingdom of Saudi Arabia].

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.subtopic1: We reserve the right to update this privacy policy at any time, and we will provide you with a new privacy policy when we make any substantial updates.

contactus.title: Contact us
contactus.subtopic1: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or our privacy practices, please contact us at Email:

contact.title: Our friendly team would love to hear from you.

about.title: Welcome to Bikerz, your trusted companion in the world of motorcycling.
about.aboutcontent: We are more than just a platform; we are a community, a mentor, a guide, and a friend to motorcycling enthusiasts in Saudi Arabia and beyond. Serving as a matchmaker, we connect first-time riders with qualified trainers for both online workshops and physical training. In addition, we foster mentorship by pairing new riders with experienced mentors. We are dedicated to transforming the way people learn, connect, and experience motorcycling. We're not just here to help you ride; we're here to help you master the art.
about.visioncontent: Our vision is to be the leading platform for motorcycling enthusiasts, providing unique, high-quality services that embrace the interests of our users and accommodate their schedules. We aim to inspire you, provide you with the knowledge and skills you need, and guide you on your journey towards mastery.
about.missioncontent: Our mission is to empower you to live the motorcycle lifestyle you've always dreamed of. We provide comprehensive solutions for learning, buying, selling, and living the motorcycle lifestyle. As a matchmaker, we connect you with qualified trainers for online workshops and physical training, and with mentors who can guide you through your journey. From helping you select the right bike to teaching you about motorcycle laws, developing the right attitude, preparing you for road scenarios, honing your skills, and mastering your bike, we've got you covered. Each of our services is designed to guide you from the stage of confusion or inexperience to a stage of clarity, competence, and expertise.
about.whyweexistcontent: We exist because we believe in the transformative power of motorcycling and the community it fosters. We believe in education, safety, and the power of community. We cater to professional men and women seeking a unique service that respects their interests and accommodates their schedules. We prioritize your safety above all else and provide a platform for you to connect, share experiences, and grow together on your motorcycling journey. We're here to guide you every step of the way on your journey towards mastery on two wheels. We exist to make your motorcycling dreams a reality.
